name: AWS Comprehend Medical

target_audience_match: Ideal for hospital IT teams drowning in clinical text who need a secure way to extract insights without risking PHI exposure.

name: Google Cloud Healthcare API
description: Securely store, transform, and analyze health data in a HIPAA-compliant environment using AI.
target_audience_match: Perfect for health system architects overwhelmed by siloed data and compliance mandates.

name: Azure Health Bot

name: Armor Anywhere
description: Cloud security and compliance monitoring platform for HIPAA and PCI-certified environments.
